issues.description: The method getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor is declared to return double in the UML diagram in the problem statement, but the solution implementation declares it with an int return type. This mismatch may confuse students about the intended return type and calculation precision.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor to double in both the template and solution, and cast the calculation to double (e.g., return (double) getTotalNumberOfStudents() / getNumberOfTutors();).
